name: Red ball & maze. Inside View
description:
"Red ball & maze. Inside View" is classic maze.
You look at the world from the perspective of the ball.
You go through a maze on the top floor. The ball falls to the next floor, etc.
But there are some obstacles on the way!
Collect bonuses (extra life) to pass through a bomb.

There are 2 control modes:
1) Accelerometer. Move your device.
2) By finger. You point the direction of the move on the screen.
